entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 10:23 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: 1.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: SE 31 km/h gust 83 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
